definitions.definition: To fail to achieve or attain.

definitions.example: The car just missed hitting a passer-by.

definitions.definition: To become aware of the loss or absence of; to feel the want or need of, sometimes with regret.
definitions.example: I miss you! Come home soon!

definitions.definition: To fail to understand; to have a shortcoming of perception; overlook.

definitions.example: Joe missed the meeting this morning.

definitions.definition: To be late for something (a means of transportation, a deadline, etc.).
To be wanting; to lack something that should be present.
definitions.example: The car is missing essential features.

definitions.definition: (said of a card) To fail to help the hand of a player.
definitions.example: Player A: J7. Player B: Q6. Table: 283. The flop missed both players!

definitions.definition: To be absent, deficient, or wanting.
